foreach(tut viennaTEST)
   add_executable(${tut} ${tut}.cpp)
   if (ENABLE_OPENCL)
     target_link_libraries(${tut} ${OPENCL_LIBRARIES})
     set_target_properties(${tut} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "-DVIENNACL_WITH_OPENCL")
   endif (ENABLE_OPENCL)
endforeach()

if (ENABLE_OPENCL)
  foreach(tut viennaTESTCL)
    add_executable(${tut} ${tut}.cpp)
    target_link_libraries(${tut} ${OPENCL_LIBRARIES})
    set_target_properties(${tut} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "-DVIENNACL_WITH_OPENCL")
  endforeach()
endif (ENABLE_OPENCL)
